com.openkm.module

接口 ScriptingModule

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DbScriptingModule, JcrScriptingModule, OKMScripting

    public interface ScriptingModule

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String getScript(java.lang.String token, java.lang.String nodePath)
      Get node script (document or folder).
      void removeScript(java.lang.String token, java.lang.String nodePath)
      Remove script from node.
      void setScript(java.lang.String token, java.lang.String nodePath, java.lang.String code)
      Add script to node.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setScript

        void setScript(java.lang.String token,
             java.lang.String nodePath,
             java.lang.String code)
               throws PathNotFoundException,
                      AccessDeniedException,
                      RepositoryException,
                      DatabaseException
        Add script to node.
        参数:
        nodePath - The complete path to the node.
        code - Script BeanShell code.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If the node defined by nodePath do not exists.
        AccessDeniedException - If the token authorization information is not valid.
        RepositoryException - If there is any error accessing to the repository.
        DatabaseException

      • removeScript

        void removeScript(java.lang.String token,
                java.lang.String nodePath)
                  throws PathNotFoundException,
                         AccessDeniedException,
                         RepositoryException,
                         DatabaseException
        Remove script from node.
        参数:
        nodePath - The complete path to the node.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If the node defined by nodePath do not exists.
        AccessDeniedException - If the token authorization information is not valid.
        RepositoryException - If there is any error accessing to the repository.
        DatabaseException

      • getScript

        java.lang.String getScript(java.lang.String token,
                         java.lang.String nodePath)
                           throws PathNotFoundException,
                                  AccessDeniedException,
                                  RepositoryException,
                                  DatabaseException
        Get node script (document or folder).
        参数:
        nodePath - The complete path to the node.
        返回:
        A hashmap with pairs of user / permissions.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If the node defined by nodePath do not exists.
        AccessDeniedException - If the token authorization information is not valid.
        RepositoryException - If there is any error accessing to the repository.
        DatabaseException
